Package org.aspectj.apache.bcel.classfile

Class Modifiers

java.lang.Object
org.aspectj.apache.bcel.classfile.Modifiers
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassGen, FieldGenOrMethodGen, FieldOrMethod, JavaClass
public abstract class Modifiers extends Object
Super class for all objects that have modifiers like private, final, ... I.e. classes, fields, and methods. was AccessFlags
Version:
$Id: Modifiers.java,v 1.2 2008/05/28 23:53:01 aclement Exp $
Author:
M. Dahm
